column2:
beento = countries %>%
  mutate(times = case_when(id %in% c("CAN", "CHN", "USA") ~ "2+",
                           id %in% c(c("ATA", "AUT", "LUX", "MEX", "BEL", "CHL", "CHE", "NLD", "CUB", "DEU", "ECU", "SGP", "FRA", "GBR", "THA", "HKG", "TWN", "TZA", "ISL", "CZE")) ~ "1",
                           TRUE ~ "0")) %>%
  st_transform(crs = "4326")
错误: crs not found: is it missing?
